trans-unit.source: Provides data for the paint events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para os eventos de paint do <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: A ChartPaintEventArgs object is used to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de ChartPaintEventArgs é utilizado para definir propriedades de gráfico durante a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>e <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>eventos do <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A> property allows you to position chart elements, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> property facilitates GDI+ drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A>propriedade permite-lhe elementos de gráfico de posição e o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>facilita a propriedade GDI+ operações de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A> property gives the developer access to the root <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, which can be used to set various properties of the chart.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A>propriedade permite o acesso de programador para a raiz <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objeto, que pode ser utilizado para definir várias propriedades do gráfico.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Chart property allows the developer to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de gráfico permite ao programador definir propriedades de gráfico durante a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>e <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>eventos do <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object for the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto para o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the chart element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o elemento de gráfico.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Use this object property during a painting event to: - Help with the conversion to and from relative and/or absolute chart coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade de objeto durante um evento de desenho:-ajuda com a conversão de e para coordenadas de gráfico relativo e/ou absoluto.

trans-unit.source: - Perform custom drawing using a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: -Executar o desenho personalizado utilizando um GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Use this object property during a painting event to position a chart element.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade de objeto durante um evento de desenho para posicionar um elemento do gráfico.
